name: flutter-learning-platform
description: A comprehensive Learning Management System (LMS) for Flutter mobile development courses

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Setup complete! Configure .env files and run npm start'
scripts.git:init: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit: Flutter Learning Platform'
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cd backend && NODE_ENV=production npm start

author: Flutter Learning Platform
